long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Block stressors distractions and doomscrolling with this lightweight distraction-blocking app. 

ShieldBug lets you maintain a block list of distracting, stressful or irritating web sites, with the goal of helping you stay focused on your life, work, hobbies and fun. Block sites by URL, keywords and topic.

Distractible writer? Compulsive doomscroller? Social-media-stressee? Let ShieldBug help you out.

Free and without ads, collects no data.

ðŸ“° What's new?

1.0.9 - Introducing "Deep breaths", which allow you to lock the Shieldbug settings so you can take a deep breath before reading something stressful.

1.0.7 - Introducing the idea of "scheduling" your block list, allowing you to have your site blocking enabled during certain times of day (e.g. for working, going to bed, studying, etc.)
